chronoMod:TwilightAssault.NAME: Twilight Assault
chronoMod:TwilightAssault.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E] and 1 chronomod:Jade.

chronoMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
chronoMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

chronoMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
chronoMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
chronoMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

chronoMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
chronoMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

chronoMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
chronoMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !chronoMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

chronoMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
chronoMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !chronoMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
